availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter B. Muir (Louisville, KY, attorney and circuit judge 5th Jud Distr)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Bardstown, Kentucky, native. Son of Jasper Muir and Isabella Brown Muir. Married to Sophronia Rizer Muir. Father of Bell Muir, Thomas R. Muir, Sydney S. Muir, Upton W. Muir, Lilian Muir, Nellie Muir, and Sophronia Muir. Graduated from Hanover College in Hanover, Indiana, and practiced law in Bardstown, Kentucky. Began practicing law in partnership with Thomas Riley in Louisville in 1852. Circuit judge of the 5th Judicial District of Kentucky in Louisville from 1858 to 1864.
